overview:
Jonathan Halligan provides sales leadership for Manticore Technology. He is responsible for revenue and sales development. Jonathan comes from a history of engaging marketers in solutions that automate campaigns and acquire customers. He most recently joins from Aprimo as the District Manager covering the central region for their SaaS offering. Prior to Aprimo, Jonathan had success at both Silverpop and Eloqua. A 15 year veteran in Technology sales with the past 6 years in the Marketing Automation space, Jonathan provides a wealth of knowledge in platforms and best practices for executing and measuring campaigns.

——————————————————————————–
